ingredients: 1  red apple, cored and chopped, 1  Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped, 1  nectarine, pitted and sliced, 2 stalks celery, chopped,   +   1/2 cup dried cranberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 1 (8 ounce) container nonfat lemon yogurt
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 1mg 0%, Sodium 55mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 14%, Dietary Fiber 4g 15%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 6mg 32%, Calcium 128mg 10%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 387mg 8%
